Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of one line of red-painted Coptic text and a number of dark-brown smudges.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394870) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394870)
